sources.name: source1
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	query: 'SELECT * 
FROM WC_DIMENSION_DS
UNION 
(SELECT * FROM WC_DIMENSION_REKEY_DS
WHERE INTEGRATION_ID IN 
(
SELECT INTEGRATION_ID 
FROM 
WC_DIMENSION_REKEY_DS
MINUS
SELECT INTEGRATION_ID 
FROM 
WC_DIMENSION_DS
)
',
	format: 'query') ~> source1
